pageTitle: Schools to start 2008-09 year nine days early | ColumbineCourier.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {19176=Jefferson County also is bringing back a fall mini-break, with schools closing Thursday and Friday, Oct. 23 and 24., 31171=Copyright © 2015, 19048=Public schools in Jefferson County will start the 2008-09 school year nine days earlier than normal, on Aug. 12., 24703=Columbine Courier | circulation@columbinecourier.com | 303-350-1030 5808 S Rapp St, Suite 119, Littleton, CO 80120 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday}
